actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that taxpayers may sue for damages resulting from wrongful seizures of property after jeopardy assessments.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers to bring civil suits in United States district courts for recovery of damages arising from unreasonable or excessive property assessments for the collection of taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that taxpayers may sue for damages resulting from wrongful seizures of property after jeopardy assessments.
